definition[0]: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it
example[0]: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
example[1]: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (=one that helps people).
example[2]: I thought it was worthwhile to clarify the matter.
note[0]: it is worthwhile to do something
